source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_000<tab>Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us be about the business of bringing the Hard Place back from the financial brink.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_000<tab>Bienvenue, partenaire<var 1D /var>! Ensemble, on va remettre le Bord du gouffre à flot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_001<tab>Welcome, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, welcome! This hall has regained some of its former liveliness, and it is in no small part due to your efforts.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_001<tab>Salut, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Les clients reviennent, doucement, mais sûrement<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_002<tab>Well, well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! For your contributions towards keeping the Hard Place in a good place, you have my heartfelt gratitude.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je pensais justement à toi<var 1D /var>! Merci pour tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ever a sight for sore piggy eyes. Thanks to you, I scarcely have a moment's rest! Rest assured that's a good thing!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_003<tab>Tu as encore une livraison pour moi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>? C'est que j'ai à peine le temps de me reposer avec ta cadence infernale<var 1D /var>! Ah... J'en pleurerais presque... de joie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_004<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my most dependable partner. What brings you here today? Have you a delivery to make? Perhaps new garb for yours truly to try? Whichever it is, it does me well to see you.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GREETING_ADKIRAGH_000_004<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! <var 08 E905 ((Ma bonne amie)) ((Mon bon ami)) /var><var 1D /var>! Que m'apportes-tu, aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>? Ma commande, ou bien... un nouveau costume pour ma garde-robe<var 1D /var>!? Quoi qu'il en soit, ta venue me ravit<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_000<tab>Que voulez-vous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Make a delivery (<var 20 E803 /var> remaining).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_001<tab>Livrer une commande spéciale (<var 20 E803 /var> livraison<var 08 E2E80302 (()) ((s)) /var> possible<var 08 E2E80302 (()) ((s)) /var>)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Cast glamour on Adkiragh.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_002<tab>Appliquer un mirage sur Adkiragh

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Learn about custom deliveries.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_003<tab>Demander plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur les commandes spéciales

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TOPMENU_000_004<tab>Annuler

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>What would you learn more about?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_000_000<tab>Sur quoi vous renseignez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>Satisfaction level.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_001_000<tab>La sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Delivery requirements and rewards.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_007_000<tab>Les conditions à remplir et les récompenses

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>Procuring collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_002_000<tab>L'obtention des objets à livrer

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>Acquiring materials.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_003_000<tab>L'obtention de matériaux d'artisanat

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>Increasing the value of crafted collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_004_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (artisans)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>Increasing the value of gathered collectables.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_005_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (mineurs et botanistes)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>Increasing the value of fish.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_006_000<tab>La façon d'augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet (pêcheurs)

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDEMENU_CANCEL<tab>Rien en particulier

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_001_000<tab>With each successful delivery, Adkiragh will come to trust you more and more, leading him to task you with assignments of greater importance.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_001_000<tab>Plus vous livrerez d'objets à Adkiragh, plus celui-ci sera satisfait de vos services.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_001_001<tab>This will be displayed in the form of a gauge atop the Custom Deliveries list. Fill this gauge to the maximum, and Adkiragh's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─as represented by little golden hearts─will increase.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_001_001<tab>Son niveau de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion s'exprime à travers une jauge en haut de la fenêtre des livraisons. Lorsque cette jauge est pleine, vous gagnez un rang. Le rang que vous avez atteint est symbolisé par des icones en forme de cœur sous la jauge de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Upon reaching a new <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you will have the opportunity to learn more about Adkiragh and his past.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_001_002<tab>Adkiragh vous proposera de vivre de nouvelles aventures au fur et à mesure que votre niveau augmentera.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_007_000<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 66 or above.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_007_000<tab>Adkiragh demande des objets différents en fonction de la classe de votre personnage. De plus, il n'accepte vos livraisons qu'une fois que vous avez atteint le niveau 66.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_007_001<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_007_001<tab>En dessous du niveau 90, vous recevez en récompense de vos livraisons des points d'expérience à la place des assignats mauves normalement octroyés.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Should you find yourself unsure as to how to procure a particular item, subcommands and item descriptions can point you in the right direction.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_000<tab>Consultez le sous-menu d'un objet lorsque vous ne savez pas comment le fabriquer ou vous le procurer, vous y trouverez les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions dont vous avez besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_001<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the recipe for the item in question.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_001<tab>Les artisans peuvent choisir l'option “Chercher la recette” pour ouvrir le carnet d'artisanat à la page de l'objet qui les intéresse et savoir de quels matériaux ils auront besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Likewise, for Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_002<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes devront quant à eux choisir “Chercher le mode de récolte” pour accéder à leur carnet de récolte et savoir où commencer leurs recherches.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_003<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_003<tab>Les pêcheurs pourront consulter la description de la créature recherchée pour savoir dans quelles eaux jeter leur ligne.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_102_003<tab>Il vous est recommandé d'utiliser un leurre métallique lorsque vous pêchez.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_004<tab>The items sought by Adkiragh fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Adkiragh deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_002_004<tab>Tous les objets, poissons et fruits de mer remis à Adkiragh doivent être collectionnables, qu'ils aient été fabriqués par un artisan, récoltés par un mineur ou un botaniste, ou ferrés par un pêcheur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Adkiragh seeks may be purchased from the scrap salvager in Idyllshire's Freewalks Roundspot.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_003_000<tab>Les artisans pourront se procurer les matériaux nécessaires pour toute confection auprès de la marchande présente sur le marché des Pas libres, à Idyllée.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_000<tab>The collectability of crafted items is directly related to their quality. Spare no effort in ensuring that the items you craft are of the highest possible quality, and you will be rewarded accordingly.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_000<tab>La valeur de collection d'un objet augmente lorsque l'artisan qui le fabrique veille à améliorer sa qualité au moment de sa confection.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_002<tab>The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inner Quiet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, granted each time you successfully increase quality, will serve you particularly well.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_002<tab>Vous obtenez <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Calme intérieur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> lorsque vous parvenez à améliorer la qualité d'un objet. Cet effet accroît l'efficacité des actions qui augmentent la qualité.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_003<tab>To be deleted.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_003<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_004<tab>Stack as many of the status as you can, then put the final flourish on your masterpiece with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Byregot's Blessing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_004<tab>Accumulez-le autant que possible et apportez la touche finale grâce à la <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bénédiction de Byregot<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> pour voir la qualité monter en flèche avant de terminer l'objet<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_005<tab>There are a host of other actions that can serve to further enhance the quality of items you craft. Once you've mastered the fundamentals, you are encouraged to experiment with varied approaches until you find your preferred crafting approach.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_004_005<tab>De multiples actions permettent d'améliorer la qualité de vos fa<var 16 /var>bri<var 16 /var>ca<var 16 /var>tions. Testez différentes méthodes pour trouver celle qui vous convient le mieux.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Before gathering a collectable item, you must increase its collectability.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_000<tab>Lorsque vous tentez de récolter un objet collectionnable, une fenêtre spéciale s'affiche. Vous pouvez alors augmenter sa valeur de collection avant de le récolter en utilisant des actions spécifiques.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_001<tab>One technique miners and botanists may employ to raise collectability is the use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scrutiny<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Scour<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Try executing this combination a few times before gathering the item.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_001<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes peuvent utiliser <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Inspection rigoureuse<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, suivie de <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sélection<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Essayez d'enchaîner cette combinaison lorsque vous essayez de récolter un objet collectionnable.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_002<tab>Gatherers seeking to procure items with higher collectability must be certain to equip gear with higher <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> ratings, as these attributes influence the effectiveness of actions that raise collectability.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_002<tab>En outre, vos ca<var 16 /var>rac<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>ris<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ques de <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Collecte<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> et de <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Savoir-faire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> augmentent l'effet de ces actions. Maximisez-les donc afin d'obtenir des objets à valeur de collection plus élevée.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Of course, these actions cannot be used to their full potential without sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>GP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A healthy balance of all three attributes is essential to make the most of your gathering.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_005_003<tab>Enfin, si votre méthode n'est pas en faute, mais que vous manquez de points de récolte (PR), munissez-vous de pièces d'équipement qui vous en procurent.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_000<tab>The collectability value of fish follows a simple rule─the bigger, the better.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_000<tab>La valeur de collection dépend directement de la taille du poisson livré.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Upon arriving at the fishing hole where your desired quarry resides, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> action, then begin fishing.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_001<tab>Seuls les poissons pêchés après avoir activé l'action <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gant de col<var 16 /var>lec<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>neur<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> seront acceptés.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_002<tab>From there, using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> followed by effective hooking actions will increase your chances of reeling in a big one.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_002<tab>Avoir recours à <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience II<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> avant d'utiliser les actions de pêche adéquates devrait vous permettre de ferrer de grosses prises.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Should you still find yourself catching only small fry, try outfitting yourself with better equipment to raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_GUIDE_006_003<tab>Si vous considérez encore que c'est du menu fretin, munissez-vous de pièces d'équipement qui améliorent votre <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Savoir-faire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>The items sought by Adkiragh fall into three categories: crafted items (obtainable by Disciples of the Hand), gathered items (obtainable by Disciples of the Land), and fish. Furthermore, Adkiragh deals only in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_000<tab>Les commandes spéciales que vous pouvez remettre à Adkiragh sont réparties en <var 48 F201F6 /var><var 49 F201F7 /var>trois catégories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><var 1D /var>: les objets fabriqués par des artisans, les objets récoltés par les mineurs et les botanistes, et les poissons et fruits de mer glanés par les pêcheurs.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>In order to deliver an item, you must be its corresponding class and level 66 or above.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_008<tab>L'objet que vous apportez à Adkiragh doit être collectionnable, et vous devez être au minimum niveau 66 pour le lui livrer.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>If you are level 89 or below, you will be awarded experience points instead of the level 90 scrips reward.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_009<tab>Si vous n'êtes pas niveau 90 lors de la livraison, vous recevrez des points d'expérience à la place des assignats mauves octroyés normalement.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>Information on how to find individual items may be found in the following manner:
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_001<tab>La recette ou le mode de récolte des objets qu'Adkiragh recherche peut être consulté de la façon suivante<var 1D /var>:

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>For Disciple of the Hand items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Crafting Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand with the list selected will bring up the crafting log and the relevant recipes.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_002<tab>Les artisans peuvent choisir l'option “Chercher la recette” pour ouvrir le carnet d'artisanat à la page de l'objet qui les intéresse et savoir de quels matériaux ils auront besoin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Materials necessary to craft the collectables Adkiragh seeks may be purchased from the scrap salvager in Idyllshire's Freewalks Roundspot.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_003<tab>Les matériaux nécessaires pour toute confection peuvent être achetés auprès de la marchande présente sur le marché des Pas libres, à Idyllée.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>For Disciple of the Land items, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Search for Item by Gathering Method<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the gathering log and the recipes in question.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_004<tab>Les mineurs et les botanistes devront quant à eux choisir “Chercher le mode de récolte” pour accéder à leur carnet de récolte et savoir où commencer leurs recherches.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>For knowledge on fish, choosing the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Display Location<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand will bring up the map of the relevant fishing hole.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_005<tab>Les pêcheurs pourront consulter la description de la créature recherchée pour savoir dans quelles eaux jeter leur ligne.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Furthermore, you may discover that using a metal spinner as a lure will expedite your fishing endeavors.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_100_005<tab>Il vous est recommandé d'utiliser un leurre métallique lorsque vous pêchez.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>The higher an item's collectability, the greater the reward you will earn from Adkiragh upon successful delivery.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_006<tab>Plus la valeur de collection de ces objets sera élevée, plus vous recevrez de récompenses.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>To learn more about collectables and how to increase collectability, speak with Adkiragh and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Learn about custom deliveries<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_000_007<tab>Pour savoir comment augmenter la valeur de collection d'un objet, il vous suffit de parler à Adkiragh et de choisir l'option “Demander plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur les commandes spéciales”. Votre ami se fera un plaisir de vous répondre.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Adkiragh's trust.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_001_000<tab>Plus vous livrerez de commandes spéciales à Adkiragh, plus il sera satisfait de vos services.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>With each successful delivery, Adkiragh will grow more and more satisfied with your efforts. Fill the gauge completely and Adkiragh's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>satisfaction level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, giving you the opportunity to learn more about your business partner.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_001_001<tab>Lorsque la jauge de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion sera pleine, votre rang augmentera et Adkiragh vous proposera de nouveaux contrats.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>You can make up to six deliveries in a given week. Deliver the items Adkiragh needs, and deliver them often to win the trust and praise of your new business partner!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_TUTORIAL_001_002<tab>Attention cependant, car vous ne pourrez lui remettre que 6 objets par semaine. N'hésitez pas à atteindre cette limite, si vous voulez voir votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion augmenter le plus vite possible.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>You have reached the weekly limit for deliveries. You may begin again starting <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
target:
TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_WEEKLYLIMIT_000_000<tab>Vous ne pouvez pas remettre plus d'objets à Adkiragh cette semaine.
La limite hebdomadaire est réinitialisée tous les <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((dimanches)) ((lundis)) ((mardis)) ((mercredis)) ((jeudis)) ((vendredis)) ((samedis)) /var> à <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D0E0F101112131415161718 /var>)) 01 /var>h (temps réel).

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>The Ishgardians may be prim and proper to a fault, but by the same token they boast rich traditions. These essentials embody that, and their exquisite ornamentation promises to enhance the enjoyment of our Ishgardian cuisine.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>Les gens ont une image très formaliste d'Ishgard, nous pourrons jouer sur ces attentes grâce à ce que tu nous apportes. Une pré<var 16 /var>sen<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion magnifique séparera le bon grain de l'ivraie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_001<tab>Hmmm, a marvelous fragrance. The produce of this land is ideal for brewing a fine spirit─one that shan't punish revelers the morrow after. Such a beverage is certain to win over our patrons.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_001<tab>Ah, oui, magnifique. Nous allons utiliser les meilleures céréales et l'eau la plus fraîche de la région pour distiller cette eau-de-vie. Ça évitera les gueules de bois, et nos habitués en seront ravis<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_002<tab>Great buuz requires great ingredients. With what you have brought, I can make buuz the equal of any found in my homeland, the dough irresistibly fluffy and the filling tantalizingly succulent.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_002<tab>Pour faire de bons buuz, il faut du bon équipement et de bons ingrédients. Avec ce que tu nous as apporté, ils seront aussi délicieux que ceux de la steppe<var 1D /var>! Je peux déjà sentir leur jus brûlant exploser dans ma bouche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_003<tab>For a space to be conducive to relaxation, all of its furnishings must be in harmony, and you have clearly taken this tenet to heart. A furnishing such as this will help to ensure that the Hard Place is our patrons' home away from home.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_003<tab>Voilà qui s'accordera par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment avec le style de l'éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment. En décorant comme il faut, les clients se sentiront à leur aise et n'auront qu'une envie<var 1D /var>: faire une pause détente au Bord du gouffre après une journée difficile<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_004<tab>Distilled from fermented mare's milk, arkhi is a popular─and potent─spirit in my homeland, and an essential part of any celebration. With this, we may look forward to much merrymaking here in Idyllshire!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_001_004<tab>L'arkhi est un alcool de chez moi. On fait fermenter du lait, puis on le distille. Il faut s'en méfier parce qu'il est quand même fort, mais comme on dit<var 1D /var>: il n'y a pas de fête sans arkhi<var 1D /var>! Celui-là va être ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nel, j'ai hâte d'en faire la promotion<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>In a frozen land such as Ishgard, 'tis hardly surprising that stews cooked over an open fire are popular fare. With this, we can kindle a cookfire of an intensity ideal for making such dishes.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>Apparemment, les chefs ishgardais font mijoter leur marmite pendant des heures au poêle à bois à cause des températures glaciales du Nord. Avec la puissante chaleur que ces boules de braises dégagent, nous n'aurons aucun mal à en faire de même<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_001<tab>Using a material with superior heat conducting properties such as this, we can expect wonderful flavors to develop during the aging process. I can scarcely wait to sample the results!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_001<tab>Ce métal transmet par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement bien la chaleur. Cela améliorera le processus de distillation, si nous l'utilisons pour construire notre alambic. Et une meilleure distillation est synonyme d'un arôme mieux conservé dans le produit final. J'ai hâte d'y goûter<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_002<tab>While the use of spices is limited in my native cuisine, a good businessman knows to adapt to his patrons. By offering buuz seasoned with this spice, we can speak to the palates of more of Idyllshire's diverse visitors.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_002<tab>Par chez moi, on n'utilise pas trop les épices, mais il faut bien s'adapter au palais de sa clientèle. Ce que tu m'apportes va me permettre d'assaisonner mes buuz et de rehausser leur goût<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_003<tab>Even in simple things such as materials for furnishings, you do not compromise. And indeed, we must not compromise where it concerns the satisfaction of our patrons.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_003<tab>Qu'il s'agisse d'une œuvre d'art ou d'un bibelot, tu utilises les meilleures matières premières, hein<var 1D /var>? C'est à ça qu'on reconnaît <var 08 E905 ((une pro<var 16 /var>fes<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nelle)) ((un pro<var 16 /var>fes<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nel)) /var><var 1D /var>! Je vais adopter ta philosophie, ça me permettra de mieux satisfaire mes clients<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_004<tab>A batch of arkhi is only as good as its vat, and with such fine materials, we can expect our brews to come out exactly as we intended. 'Tis well worth the additional effort!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_002_004<tab>Hmm... Tu ne choisis pas tes composants à la légère avant de te lancer sur un projet. Le fût dans lequel mûrira notre arkhi sera lui-même d'une qualité ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nelle. Je devrai prendre mon mal en patience le temps de la fermentation, mais le résultat sera à la hauteur de l'attente<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>Ah, a truly fine specimen of northern oyster, heavy with succulent flesh. We must see this to our diners while it is still fresh!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>Magnifique <var 33 ((Item)) 0DE8020202 /var><var 1D /var>! Rien qu'en la tenant dans les mains on devine que sa chair va être bien ferme. Je vais devoir servir ça au plus tôt, pour conserver sa fraîcheur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_001<tab>Well now, if this isn't used to make seaweed tonic. Such a beverage may prove too exotic for most, but 'tis undoubtedly in the character of the Hard Place to offer such unusual items.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_001<tab>Oh, mais on va pouvoir distiller un alcool à base d'algues avec ça<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas banal, mais le Bord du gouffre lui-même n'est pas une taverne ordinaire, après tout. J'en mettrai une bouteille de côté pour les fins connaisseurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_002<tab>Look at these bright eyes and shiny scales! With some preparation to remove the muddy flavor, this chakrafish will cook up to be a most delectable morsel. A fine substitute for dzo, the meat of choice back home.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_002<tab>Ce spécimen est bien vigoureux<var 1D /var>! De mon temps, on préparait nos plats avec une base de hainag, mais on peut très bien utiliser de la viande de poisson chatkra. Bien nettoyé et cuit à point, sa chair fond sous la langue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_003<tab>Well, well, if this isn't a wicked wartfish I see! You've done well to reel in such a rare─and usable─fish. Not only is its flesh good for eating; being relatively odorless, its oil is also ideal for use as fuel.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_003<tab><var 2B ((<var 33 ((Item)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var>, on n'en croise pas tous les jours<var 1D /var>! Tout se garde dans ce poisson. Non seulement il est délicieux, mais en plus on peut en extraire de l'huile pour les lampes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_004<tab>Oho, this salmon is far from home indeed, a kindred spirit to yours truly! Whether sliced up and served raw or rubbed in salt and grilled over charcoal, it makes a most toothsome accompaniment to spirits.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_KNOWLEDGE_ADKIRAGH_003_004<tab>Quel bon gros <var 33 ((Item)) 0DE8020202 /var> que voilà<var 1D /var>! En amuse-gueule, il se marie par<var 16 /var>fai<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment avec les alcools forts. On le servira cru accompagné d'arkhi, ou alors grillé et finement salé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_000<tab>Now then, let me examine it by the light... Yes, the quality is more than adequate. Our patrons will have no cause for complaint.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_000<tab>Voyons voir... Hmm... Il y a pas à dire, c'est de la bonne qualité. Mes clients vont adorer, j'en suis certain<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_001<tab>Now then, let me examine it by the light... Hmmm, yes, there is no faulting the quality. You never cease to impress me with your work, my friend.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_001<tab>Voyons voir... Hmm... Hmm<var 1D /var>? D'ordinaire il y a toujours quelques petits défauts, mais là je peine à en trouver un<var 1D /var>! Tu m'étonneras toujours <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_002<tab>Now then, let me examine it by the light... By Azim, the quality is transcendent! The manifestation of an ideal I did not think existed! You, my friend, are a miracle worker!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_002<tab>Voyons voir... Hmm... Que...<var 1D /var>!? Mais...<var 1D /var>!? C'est la perfection absolue<var 1D /var>! Tu maîtrises tous les aspects de ta profession, je n'ai pas d'autres mots. Je n'ai jamais vu mieux, même en rêve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_003<tab>Now then, let me examine it by the light... Yes, the quality is above reproach, befitting the opulence that the Hard Place endeavors to deliver. Very well done!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_003<tab>Voyons voir... Hmm... J'ai beau chercher, je ne trouve rien à redire. Le Bord du gouffre sera transformé grâce à cette merveille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_004<tab>Now then, let me examine it by the light... Oho! In a word, the quality is superb! I'm thoroughly impressed, and I've no doubt that our patrons will be too!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_JUDGEMENT_ADKIRAGH_000_004<tab>Voyons voir... Hmm... Q-quel degré de qualité<var 1D /var>! Un chouïa de ce produit et les habitants d'Idyllée seront aux anges<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Unable to obtain your reward. Your inventory is full.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_FULLBAG_000_000<tab>Impossible d'obtenir la récompense de changement de rang. Votre inventaire est plein.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>To collect your reward, make room in your inventory and speak with Adkiragh once more.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_FULLBAG_000_001<tab>Reparlez à Adkiragh lorsque vous aurez fait assez de place.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_000_000<tab>Thanks to you, we have everything we require. The time is come to put our new menu to the proof. Azim as my witness, we will restore the Hard Place to its former glory!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_000_000<tab>Je pense qu'on a toutes les provisions qu'il nous faut. À notre tour de montrer ce qu'on sait faire<var 1D /var>! L'avenir du Bord du gouffre dépend de ce nouveau menu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>Thanks to you, our very own house spirit is now ready to be served. I must confess to feeling somewhat nervous, as if I were sending my child into his first battle. Not that I have any children, of course!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>Mapopo a de quoi distiller notre eau-de-vie, maintenant. Ahhh... J'ai l'impression de voir mon enfant partir au combat... F-façon de parler, hein<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>Thanks to you, we're now ready to offer our special buuz. Our patrons are bound to love this variation on the traditional recipe. I must hand it to the Mol─it never would have occurred to me to use catfish in the filling.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>Nos buuz vont bientôt pouvoir prendre d'assaut les papilles idylléennes grâce à toi<var 1D /var>! Ils étaient déjà aux menus, mais cette nouvelle recette remportera un vif succès. De la chair de Namazu dans la farce... La cuisine mol me donne la chair de poule...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>Thanks to you, we've amassed a fine selection of furnishings. By ensuring that the Hard Place is well appointed, we can keep our patrons comfortable. And a comfortable patron is a happy patron!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_BEFRANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>Tes décorations ont effacé la morosité de notre intérieur<var 1D /var>! Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je m'en voudrais si nos clients étaient déçus à peine le seuil de l'éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment franchi. Il est grandiose, maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>You'll be pleased to hear that our Ishgardian dishes have proven tremendously popular with our regular patrons. They're so impressed, in fact, they all go off promising to spread the word. Little by little, we're regaining the custom we once enjoyed.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>La cuisine ishgardaise semble plaire à notre clientèle, et ça, c'est grâce à tout ce que tu nous as livré<var 1D /var>! Je constate déjà un regain d'affluence, mais nos habitués ont dit qu'ils feraient la promotion du Bord du gouffre au-delà d'Idyllée, alors ça ne fait sûrement que commencer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_001<tab>Thank you for your patronage! We look forward to your next visit!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_001<tab>Merci d'avoir choisi le Bord du gouffre<var 1D /var>! Nous espérons vous revoir très bientôt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_002<tab>You really are a natural at this. But...er, don't you think it's about time you shed with that outfit?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_002<tab>Bien, bien<var 1D /var>! Tu t'es vite habituée à ton nouvel emploi<var 1D /var>! J'aurais bien émis quelques réserves sur ton costume, mais vu l'accoutrement du patron...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_003<tab>Well, there's no guarantee that my pursuers won't return. Besides, I quite enjoy dressing like Master Adkiragh!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_003<tab>Hé hé<var 1D /var>! Allons bon<var 1D /var>! Je ne m'habille de cette façon que dans l'éventualité où l'on chercherait à nouveau à me ramener de force à Ishgard. Ainsi, je n'ai qu'à revêtir le masque pour passer inaperçue. De plus, ça ne me déplaît pas de porter le même déguisement que notre patron<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_004<tab>(It should have been meeeeee!)
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_004<tab>C-c'est pas juste<var 1D /var>! Moi aussi, je veux ressembler au patron<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_005<tab>Mistress Mapopo, I have been meaning to ask─how long have you been working at the Hard Place?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_005<tab>Au fait, vous travaillez ici depuis longtemps, Mapopo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_006<tab>How long? Why, only as long as it's existed!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_006<tab>Hé hé hé... Depuis la fondation du Bord du gouffre. Mais sache que le patron et moi, ça remonte à plus loin que ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_007<tab>I used to be a treasure hunter, you see. But one day, I ran afoul of a terrible fiend. It would've made a meal of me had the chief not chanced to be nearby. Ahhh, I'll never forget the sight of him standing over the creature's bloody corpse... So majestic, so dreamy...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_007<tab>J'étais chasseuse de trésors à l'époque. Un jour, alors que j'explorais une zone propice, un monstre par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement coriace m'est tombé sur le râble<var 1D /var>! Par un heureux hasard, celui qui allait devenir notre patron chassait dans les environs et m'a sauvé la vie in extremis.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_008<tab>A-Anyway! The chief saved my life that day. And I've been at his side ever since.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_008<tab>Depuis, on ne s'est plus jamais quittés. Au... Autrement dit, c'est moi qui le connais le mieux<var 1D /var>! Voilà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_009<tab>Oh, my! To think that Master Adkiragh is a skilled warrior as well! Is there nothing he cannot do?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_009<tab>Notre patron serait aussi un guerrier dans l'âme<var 1D /var>!? Oh, comme c'est fabuleux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_010<tab>Well, 'twas not for naught that I was favored to become khan of the largest tribe on the Steppe. Next to my brilliance, that self-proclaimed Sun would appear as a pallid candle! Hah hah hah...hah?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_010<tab>Que ce soit les chefs ou les femmes, personne ne me résiste<var 1D /var>! C'est pas pour rien que j'étais le successeur tout désigné à la tête de la plus grande tribu de la steppe<var 1D /var>! Ah ah ah ah ah<var 1D /var>! Ah ah... Heu...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_011<tab>Khan? Largest tribe on the Steppe?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MELODIE_001_011<tab>Successeur du chef d'une grande tribu<var 1D /var>? Comment ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_012<tab>Uwaaah! P-Pay me no mind! 'Twas but idle musing, nothing more!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_012<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! Oublie ce que j'ai dit<var 1D /var>! M-ma langue a fourché, voilà tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_013<tab><sigh> You always do that, chief. If you don't want to talk about something, you shouldn't bring up the subject.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_013<tab>Oui, enfin... c'est pas la première fois quand même. Va falloir arrêter de nous prendre pour des poires.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_014<tab>E-Enough talk! Everyone, return to your duties!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_014<tab>Non, mais oh<var 1D /var>! Allez, fini de discutailler<var 1D /var>! Vous avez du travail<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>Glad tidings, my friend─our house spirit is enjoying unprecedented popularity! Mapopo is beside herself with joy!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>La popularité de l'eau-de-vie du Bord du gouffre monte en flèche grâce à toi<var 1D /var>! Je ne suis pas le seul à m'en réjouir, Mapopo aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_001<tab>(-Bewildered Au Ra-)At long last, we made it... Gods, please let him be here...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_001<tab>(-Ao Ra au bout du rouleau-)J'en peux plus<var 1D /var>! Où est-ce qu'il est<var 1D /var>!? Pourquoi il nous a laissés tomber comme ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_002<tab>(-Travelworn Au Ra-)He will be! He <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var>, after all that we've been through...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_002<tab>(-Ao Ra épuisé-)On... (respire) On a réussi à s'échapper vivants du camp et à parvenir jusqu'ici, c'est déjà ça. Maintenant, faut juste trouver le chef<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_003<tab>Alghu? Teleboge? What are you two doing here!?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_003<tab>Alghu<var 1D /var>!? Teleboge<var 1D /var>!? Mais qu'est-ce que vous fichez là<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_004<tab>That voice! It could only be...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_004<tab>Cette voix... Je la reconnaîtrais entre mille<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_005<tab>Chief! It's you! It's really you!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_005<tab>Chef<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_006<tab>Hmmm... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I believe you can be trusted with my secret.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_006<tab>Hmm... Vous pouvez mettre <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> dans la confidence.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_007<tab>Be not astonished, but the chief was once poised to become khan. Not just any khan, mind you, but that of the largest tribe on all the Steppe─the Adarkim.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_007<tab>Hé hé hé... Adkiragh vient d'Orient<var 1D /var>! C'est le prétendant au titre de chef des Adarkim, la plus grande tribu xaela de la Steppe d'Azim<var 1D /var>! Ça t'en bouche un coin, pas vrai<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_008<tab>But with great standing comes great risk, and after eight assassination attempts and four sham marriages, he abruptly disappeared with nary a word.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_008<tab>Mais tout n'est pas rose dans la vie de chef. Avant qu'il vienne se planquer ici, Adkiragh a esquivé huit assassinats et pas moins de quatre croqueuses de diamants<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_009<tab>We two are sworn to serve the chief till death. Thus did we set out in search of him. First we scoured the length and breadth of the Steppe, but when we failed to find him there, we decided to venture farther afield. And after a grueling journey during which we were runaways, stowaways, and castaways in turn, we finally arrived here.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_009<tab>Eh ouais, mais ça nous a pas arrêtés pour autant<var 1D /var>! On connaît le chef depuis qu'on est gamins, alors on n'allait pas le laisser s'exiler comme ça. On l'a cherché aux quatre coins de la steppe, et nos aventures ont fini par nous mener ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_010<tab>H-How can this be? How can you learn the truth of my illustrious identity and not be surprised? <var 1A 02 /var>Impressed<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_010<tab>C'est tout ce que ça te fait<var 1D /var>!? Attends... Me dis pas que tu le savais déjà<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_Q1_002_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_Q1_002_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_002_001<tab>I met your brother on the Steppe.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_002_001<tab>Ton petit frère te cherchait dans la Steppe d'Azim.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_002_002<tab>I don't pry into people's past.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_A1_002_002<tab>Je ne fourre pas mon nez dans le passé des gens.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_011<tab>You met my brother? And he's searching for me, you say? That is...not wholly unexpected.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_011<tab>T'as rencontré mon frère<var 1D /var>!? Et il me cherchait, en plus<var 1D /var>!? Ben, ça alors...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_012<tab>Hm-hmmm. As a roaming soul yourself, you understand─as do the people of Idyllshire. Here, what matters is not your past, but what you do for the settlement's future.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_012<tab>J'en attendais pas moins <var 08 E905 ((d'une aventurière vagabonde)) ((d'un aventurier vagabond)) /var>. On se comprend entre gens d'Idyllée, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_013<tab>Now, you two─how did you know to find me here?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_013<tab>Au fait, vous deux, comment vous m'avez trouvé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_014<tab>Well, chief, many adventurers come through Reunion these days. Through them, we heard tell of a tavern far to the west. Imagine our surprise when we learned that the proprietor was a man named Adkiragh!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_014<tab>De plus en plus d'aventuriers font halte au Ralliement, der<var 16 /var>niè<var 16 /var>re<var 16 /var>ment. Parmi eux, il y en a pas mal qui vantent la bonne cuisine du Bord du gouffre. C'est là-bas qu'on a entendu ton nom.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_015<tab>Ugh, that my whereabouts should be exposed in such a manner... Well, 'tis unlikely that any would-be assassins would follow me all this way.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_015<tab>Argh... C'est donc ça la rançon du succès<var 1D /var>? Rassure-moi, ces gros lâches d'assassins ne viendraient pas me chercher jusqu'ici, quand même<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_016<tab>We did have one doubt, however. If you'd go so far as to conceal your face, why in the world would you go by your true name?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_016<tab>Je sais pas pour eux, mais je pensais pas qu'il s'agissait de toi, personnellement. Le chef aurait pas utilisé son vrai nom alors qu'il se déguise, je me suis dit.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_017<tab>But lo and behold, it really was you. We're quite baffled, to be honest.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_017<tab>On peut dire que tu nous en as fait une belle...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_018<tab>A-Ahem! Such trifling details aside, you must not tell the others of this. It would not do to cause unnecessary concern.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_018<tab>U-une belle<var 1D /var>!? Ou-oublions cette histoire, d'accord<var 1D /var>!? Et pas un mot de tout ça aux autres, hein<var 1D /var>? Je voudrais pas qu'ils... qu'ils se fassent du mouron pour moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>People are coming from near and far for our special buuz. This would not have been possible without you to supply the ingredients─and my illustrious self to make the mouthwatering stuff, of course!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>Nos clients viennent de plus en plus loin pour goûter nos buuz nouvelle recette<var 1D /var>! En plus, les produits inédits que tu nous livres nous permettent d'affiner nos talents de cuisiniers. C'est pas beau ça<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_001<tab>But to another matter. There is something with which I require your...discreet assistance. Recently, Melodie claims to have seen a Xaela man here in Idyllshire. By her judgment, he did not appear to be an adventurer.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_001<tab>La taverne tourne bien, par contre, la petite Melodie m'a parlé d'un truc qui m'inquiète un peu. Elle aurait vu un Ao Ra en ville, et d'après elle, il avait pas la tête d'un aventurier...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_002<tab>I have an ill foreboding about this individual, and I need you to investigate. I would do the deed myself, but I have my hands full with orders for buuz.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_002<tab>Cette histoire sent le hainag à plein nez<var 1D /var>! Tu pourrais demander à Melodie de t'en dire plus<var 1D /var>? Moi, je suis occupé, à cause heu... d'une grosse commande<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_003<tab>To begin with, I suggest you speak with Melodie. Do not delay─the continued survival of the Hard Place may well be at stake!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_003<tab>J'ai personne d'autre sur qui compter, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Le destin du Bord du gouffre pourrait bien être en jeu, et c'est ce qui compte le plus à mes petits yeux tout ronds.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_000<tab>With your furnishings adorning this hall, we've been attracting new patrons not only with our food, but with our ambience as well. The result being we are doing better business than we have in many moons!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_000<tab>Tes livraisons ont fait des miracles, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Nos clients louent même le cadre de la taverne, maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_001<tab>Which leads me to my next piece of news...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_001<tab>J'ai aussi quelque chose à t'annoncer, d'ailleurs. Tu es prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_002<tab>Finally, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─finally, we are profitable once more! Such a stellar recovery, we couldn't have achieved without you. I knew I was right to place my faith in you, my friend. Truly, I never cease to amaze myself with my powers of judgment.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_002<tab>Nous sommes sauvés, les comptes du Bord du gouffre sont à nouveau dans le vert<var 1D /var>! Je savais que tu étais capable de faire des miracles, et tu ne m'as pas déçu<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_003<tab>Master Adkiragh! Lest you forget, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is Zhloe's supplier first and foremost!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_003<tab>N'essayez pas de l'accaparrrer<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> est <var 08 E905 ((MA fournisseuse)) ((MON fournisseur)) /var>, à la base<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_004<tab>...Heh heh, just kidding! By saving the Hard Place, you saved the orphanage as well. Now I can sleep at night again without having to count flatbread, which wasn't that helpful anyway because I'd run out at about five pieces.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_004<tab>Je plaisante, bien sûr. La peur de voir les enfants sans toit au-dessus de leur tête m'a prrrivée de sommeil plus d'une fois. Ces nuits-là, je comptais mes pains plats pour essayer de m'endormir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_005<tab>Ah, but seeing Master Adkiragh's success has inspired Zhloe to redouble her efforts. Which is to say <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> have to redouble your efforts, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─for the children!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ZHLOEALIAPOH_004_005<tab>Je ne vais pas laisser toute la gloirrre à Adkiragh pour autant<var 1D /var>! Les enfants comptent sur moi aussi, alors j'espère que vous ne m'oublierez pas, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_GEIMLONA_004_006<tab>Allow me to express my gratitude too, adventurer. With the Hard Place prosperin' again, your fellow adventurers're startin' to return to Idyllshire.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_GEIMLONA_004_006<tab>Je vous suis re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante, moi aussi. Idyllée connaît un nouvel essor depuis que le Bord du gouffre a gagné en popularité.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_GEIMLONA_004_007<tab>As a woman of the House and a citizen of Idyllshire both─thank you, from the bottom of my heart.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_GEIMLONA_004_007<tab>Je vous remercie aussi au nom de tous les habitants et de la maison des splendeurs de Rowena.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_008<tab>I have experienced many and more hardships in my life, but this one alone, I do not think I could have overcome without your help.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_008<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'en ai vu des vertes et des pas mûres, tu sais. D'habitude, je sais me tirer d'affaire tout seul, mais ça n'aurait pas été si simple cette fois. Tu m'as vraiment sauvé la mise.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_009<tab>The Hard Place is more than just a tavern. It is the only home the children of the orphanage know, and a place where dreamers of all walks may gather to rest away their cares.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_009<tab>Le Bord du gouffre, ce n'est pas qu'une taverne. C'est aussi la maison de nos orphelins et un havre de paix où les pionniers peuvent échanger leurs idées ou se détendre, tout simplement.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_010<tab>That this place could be all of these things is because you and other kind souls have reached out a helping hand to this piggy. For that, I give you my heartfelt thanks.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_010<tab>Le destin de l'éta<var 16 /var>blis<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment a été sauvé le jour où toi et les autres avez décidé de tendre la main à ce joli porcelet.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_011<tab>Now, come, my friend! Let us keep up our great work!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_011<tab>Je te revaudrai ça, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Foi de cochon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I was wondering when you'd come by again.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_100<tab>Bienvenue, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Comment allez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_101<tab>I have a proposal I'd like to run by you and the chief.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_101<tab>Ah, ça me rappelle<var 1D /var>! Je voulais discuter de quelque chose avec vous et le patron<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_102<tab>You see, after Melodie came to us, I found I had a little more spare time. So I started learning some alchemy from the goblins, and I've gotten as far as being able to make a simple distiller.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_102<tab>J'ai un peu plus de temps libre depuis que nous avons engagé Melodie, et j'en ai profité pour demander aux Gobelins de m'apprendre les bases de l'alchimie. Je me débrouille assez bien pour fabriquer un alambic relativement simple, et ça m'a donné une idée.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_103<tab>That gave me an idea: what if we were to make a house spirit to serve to our patrons?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_MAPOPO_001_103<tab>Patron<var 1D /var>! Que diriez-vous de distiller notre propre alcool<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_104<tab>Hmmm, the Hard Place's very own drop... I do like the sound of that. And if we are to reverse our fortunes, we must not shy from a challenge. Yes, let us undertake this endeavor!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_104<tab>Est-ce que ça vaut vraiment le coup<var 1D /var>? Là est la question... Allez, qui ne tente rien n'a rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_105<tab>Once again, we must rely on your help, my friend. Will you procure for us the items we need to make our own spirit?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_105<tab>Il nous faudra ton aide pour mener ce projet à bien. Je peux compter sur toi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_106<tab>That's the spirit! Pun shamelessly intended!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_106<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_100<tab>For as long as we can remember, the chief has always hidden his true identity to others. It's unheard of for him to trust an outsider.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_100<tab>Alors comme ça, on est dans les petits papiers du chef<var 1D /var>? Il garde le secret depuis un bail, comment tu t'es débrouillé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour qu'il t'accorde sa confiance si facilement<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_101<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has earned my trust thrice over. It is by virtue of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> help that this tavern still exists, and if you two mean to remain here, then I expect you to make a contribution as well.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_101<tab>Hé, lâchez-<var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var>. Le Bord du gouffre n'existerait déjà plus sans <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. D'ailleurs, si vous avez l'intention de rester ici, vous deux, il va falloir mettre la main à la pâte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_102<tab>Well then, chief, I have an idea. A new type of buuz invented by the Mol has been popular of late. With your permission, we'll return to the Steppe to learn the secrets of its making.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ALGHU_002_102<tab>Je sais comment on pourrait aider, chef<var 1D /var>! En cuisinant des buuz bien de chez nous<var 1D /var>! Les Mol ont inventé une nouvelle recette qui fait gargouiller les estomacs d'un bout à l'autre de la steppe. On a qu'à la leur demander<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_103<tab>Ah, yes, the one with the new filling. While we're there, we can gather the ingredients as well so we can make it here!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_103<tab>On s'occupe de rassembler tout ce qu'il faut<var 1D /var>! Donne-nous un coup de main, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_104<tab>Oh, and worry not, chief─we'll take care not to be seen by our tribesmen.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_TELEBOGE_002_104<tab>T'inquiète, on fera bien gaffe en revenant. Il est pas né le type qui arrivera à nous filer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_105<tab>While the idea is sound, I have my doubts about their ability to carry it out. I would feel much more at ease if you were to assist them.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_105<tab>Je ne suis pas convaincu qu'ils réussiront seuls... Va les aider, s'il te plaît. Je suis sûr que tout se passera bien avec toi.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_106<tab>Dependable as always. We are so close to becoming profitable again; let us not lose our momentum. Go forth, my friend, and bring us the ingredients for making this new buuz!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_106<tab>Je suis déjà rassuré<var 1D /var>! Ces buuz pourraient être ce qui nous manque pour remettre nos finances dans le vert<var 1D /var>! On y est presque, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_100<tab>There is something I wish to speak with you about.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_100<tab>Bien, parlons de tes prochaines livraisons.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_101<tab>When first I came to Eorzea, an outsider without a gil to his name, Idyllshire was the only place that welcomed me.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_101<tab>Une des qualités d'Idyllée qui me plaît le plus, c'est l'hospitalité de ses habitants. Ils acceptent tout le monde, même ceux comme moi qui n'ont nulle part où aller.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_102<tab>The Ishgardians, for instance, judged me solely by my appearance, looking me up and down before turning me away. So much for “civilized” peoples, I thought.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_102<tab>Rien à voir avec ces rétrogrades d'Ishgardais qui m'ont claqué la porte au nez<var 1D /var>! Ils jugent encore les gens sur leur apparence<var 1D /var>! Tss...

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_103<tab>My own tribe is no better. The Adarkim are ever racked by internal feuds, rivals trying to get the better of one another. The idiocy of it all left me bitter and jaded.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_103<tab>Dans ma tribu, les Adarkim, on se bat pour devenir chef mais aussi pour le rester. Ces querelles constantes ont fini par me lasser, et j'ai décidé de partir. J'ai atterri à Idyllée, et devine comment j'ai été accueilli.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_104<tab>But this town restored my faith in my fellow man. Here, folk of all races and walks of life live together in harmony, joining hands in common cause. Fondly do I remember when I first set about establishing the Hard Place. One after the next, my neighbors came and offered me unsolicited help.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_104<tab>Ses habitants m'ont tendu la main chaque fois qu'ils le pouvaient<var 1D /var>! Ici, les gens se serrent les coudes quelle que soit leur race<var 1D /var>! Les uns après les autres, ils se sont proposé de m'aider quand j'ai entrepris de construire ma taverne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_105<tab>They've done me a good turn. It's only fair that I return the favor. This I mean to do by making the Hard Place the best place it can be.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_105<tab>Mais c'est fini tout ça. Hé hé hé... À leur tour de m'être redevables<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_106<tab>A place where folk can relax and eat their fill. Where they can raise their cups in good times and in bad. Where they can chatter about everything and nothing until the break of dawn.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_106<tab>Maintenant, quand ils franchiront le seuil de ma taverne, je me joindrai à leur con<var 16 /var>ver<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>tion pour créer une bonne ambiance, et quand ils commanderont, je leur servirai les meilleurs plats qu'ils aient jamais goûtés<var 1D /var>! Pour couronner le tout, j'offrirai un verre de liqueur bien de chez moi à chacun d'eux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_107<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_107<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_108<tab>
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_108<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_109<tab>Everything that Idyllshire has given me, I intend to give back and more. To that end, I hope that I can continue to rely on your help.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_109<tab>Tu connais mon plan. À présent, j'aimerais que tu m'aides à le réaliser.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_110<tab>...What's that? You wonder why I still wear my disguise, though there is no longer a need to hide? Well, by now it has become a part of my identity. My brand, if you will.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_110<tab>Tu te demandes sûrement pourquoi je continue de porter ce masque, alors que ça ne sert plus à rien. Eh bien... disons qu'il fait partie de mon identité désormais. Je ne peux pas plus m'en séparer que de mon bras, si tu veux.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_111<tab>That being said, as a businessman, I'm well aware of the import of staying abreast of prevailing trends. Moreover, I'm ever on the lookout for opportunities to broaden my horizons.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_111<tab>Ceci dit, un bon commerçant se doit d'être à la pointe des dernières tendances. Et puis, mon nombre d'employés a récemment doublé. Pour les payer, je vais devoir élargir mon champ d'activité, et donc ma perspective.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_112<tab>Therefore, I give you permission to use glamour prisms upon me. With your surpassing fashion sense, give me an appearance that you think will speak to our clientele!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_LCUT_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_004_112<tab>On pourrait utiliser les prismes mirages pour m'y aider<var 1D /var>! Tu connais, non<var 1D /var>? Ce sont des objets magiques qui permettent de projeter une illusion pour modifier l'apparence. Fais de moi un porcelet à la mode grâce à leur pouvoir décoratif<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Adkiragh is pleased with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Friend of the Hard Place<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_000<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a augmenté. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous considère maintenant comme <var 08 E905 ((une contributrice active)) ((un contributeur actif)) /var> au redressement du Bord du gouffre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Adkiragh is delighted with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Supporter of the Hard Place<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_001<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a augmenté. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous considère maintenant comme <var 08 E905 ((une inconditionnelle)) ((un inconditionnel)) /var> du Bord du gouffre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Adkiragh is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Cornerstone of the Hard Place<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_002<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a changé. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous considère maintenant comme <var 08 E905 ((une protectrice)) ((un protecteur)) /var> du Bord du gouffre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Adkiragh could not be happier with your efforts. He now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Savior of the Hard Place<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_000_003<tab>Votre rang de sa<var 16 /var>tis<var 16 /var>fac<var 16 /var>tion a changé. <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> vous considère maintenant comme <var 08 E905 ((la sauveuse)) ((le sauveur)) /var> du Bord du gouffre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>And yet there is still much work to be done if the Hard Place is to not only survive, but thrive as well. To that end, Adkiragh has a new favor to ask of you...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_001_001<tab>Le Bord du gouffre fait toujours face à la faillite, mais <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> réfléchit à ce dont il aurait besoin pour éviter cette triste fin.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Through your efforts, the Hard Place has managed to turn its financial fortunes around. It seems, however, that Adkiragh has a different sort of favor to ask of you...
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUPINFO_001_002<tab>Le Bord du gouffre se porte bien, mais <var 28 ((ENpcResident)) E80201 /var> a encore besoin de vos services.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>The Custom Deliveries list for Adkiragh has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Adkiragh and select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_000_001<tab>Adkiragh a atteint l'objectif qu'il s'était fixé et a désormais besoin de nouveaux objets. Adressez-lui la parole et choisissez l'option “Livrer une commande spéciale” pour voir ce que votre ami requiert à présent.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>A new quest continuing the story of the Hard Place's financial fortunes is now available from Melodie. Upon its completion, the Custom Deliveries list for Adkiragh will be updated.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_001_001<tab>Une quête des commandes spéciales d'Adkiragh est disponible. Parlez à Melodie au Bord du gouffre pour la débuter. Lorsque vous l'aurez accomplie, la liste des objets à livrer sera mise à jour.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>Future requests will be selected at random from all those you have seen thus far, with the list refreshed once a week (Earth time).
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_001<tab>Les commandes à livrer à Adkiragh sont mises à jour toutes les semaines. Il vous demande ainsi un objet choisi aléatoirement parmi tous ceux dont il a pu avoir besoin par le passé.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab>You may review the items currently in demand at any time by speaking with Adkiragh and selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Make a delivery<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_002<tab>Adressez-lui la parole et choisissez “Livrer une commande spéciale” pour savoir ce que vous devez désormais lui apporter.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>Note that arkhi brewing essentials, distillery materials, and Othardian salmon will earn you particularly handsome rewards. Whenever they make an appearance, the effort to procure them will be worth your while.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_003<tab>D'autre part, les composants pour arkhi du Bord du gouffre, les éléments nécessaires à une fermentation et les saumons d'Othard rapportent une plus grande récompense. Concentrez donc vos efforts sur eux s'ils font partie des objets à livrer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_004<tab>Furthermore, Adkiragh's appearance may now be altered through the use of glamours.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_AFTRANKUP_002_004<tab>Enfin, vous pouvez désormais modifier l'apparence d'Adkiragh à l'aide de mirages.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>Many thanks for your many deliveries, my friend.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_000<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. On devrait avoir de quoi faire avec ça.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_001<tab>Truly, you are skilled at what you do─and truly, I have a keen eye for skill.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_001_001<tab>Tu as été à la hauteur<var 1D /var>! Zhloe ne s'était pas trompée sur ton compte, et moi non plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>I would swear, no sooner do you make a delivery than you reappear to make another. Your work ethic is astounding, my friend, and the Hard Place is better for it.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_000<tab>Et voilà qui devrait faire l'affaire<var 1D /var>! Tu es un don du ciel, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_001<tab>We're seeing more patrons than ever before, and you can take credit for this achievement. Well, <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> of it at any rate. It wouldn't be fair to attribute all of this to you, now, would it?
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_002_001<tab>Tout ceci, c'est grâce à toi. Le nombre de clients a bondi depuis que tu nous as offert ton soutien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>Owing to your unflagging effort, the Hard Place continues to do brisk business.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_000<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Aujourd'hui encore, les caisses débordent<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_001<tab>And yet, while I appreciate your dedication to our cause, I would not deny your talents to others. As a khan must give satisfaction to many women, so too should you apply yourself for the good of many.
target: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_001<tab>Au fait, de ce qu'on m'a dit, tu t'es aussi fait une belle réputation de <var 08 E905 ((guerrière)) ((guerrier)) /var> dans la Steppe d'Azim.

source: TEXT_CTSSFSCHARACTER4_00541_RANKUP_ADKIRAGH_003_002<tab>But even the most tireless among us need rest. Whenever the rigors of life take their toll, you may always return here─to bask in the restorative presence of yours truly.
